title: Bug 3970 [preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970 [preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PCs are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file, the current behavior is to use the line delimiter returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). However, this may not always be what the user wants.
EB: Add a UI feature in the preferences settings that allows users to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open Eclipse on a Windows workstation.
2. Create a new file.
3. Check the line delimiters used in the new file, it should match the line delimiter returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter").
4. Note that there is no UI option available to define the default line delimiters for new files.
